organic.title: The all new EA app for Windows
organic.snippet: The EA app is our fastest and lightest PC client to date. With the new streamlined design you will easily find the games and content you're looking for.

organic.title: Re: [EA app] Game Launcher Looping After Clicking Start
organic.snippet: I used a community mod to remove built-in, in-game launcher so that it facilitates my selection of the game faster without the risk of rebooting loop error.
